metadata.title: RA Family: Where can I buy the Kit and how much ?

sections.content:
Question:
Where can I buy the Kit and how much ?
Answer:
This kit is complimentary and be able to get it by requesting via the following web pages.
TW001-VUIA4E1POCZ
https://www.renesas.com/products/microcontrollers-microprocessors/ra-cortex-m-mcus/tw001-vuia4e1pocz-ra4e1-voice-user-reference-kit
TW001-VUIA6E1POCZ
https://www.renesas.com/products/microcontrollers-microprocessors/ra-cortex-m-mcus/tw001-vuia6e1pocz-ra6e1-voice-user-reference-kit
You will need to register MyRenesas account to complete the request.
Suitable Products
MCU : RA4E1 or RA6E1
LDO : RAA214220
Op-Amp : READ2302G
QSPI : AT25SF641B
